posts.message:
Front End/UI Developer is needed for a fast growing healthcare technology company with the following requirements:
*Expert with hand-coding advanced HTML5, CSS3, JS/AJAX techniques.
*Knowledge of CSS frameworks (i.e. Twitter Bootstrap)
*Familiar with CSS preprocessing frameworks.
*Familiar with Visual Studio 2012.
 *Keep up to date with the latest tools, techniques and best practices and help introduce new ideas to the
team.
*JavaScript and UI programming using client-side libraries like jQuery, and KnockoutJs is a plus

Job Description:
*Collaborates with team to create HTML5 page layouts, professional visual appearance, CSS creation and resolve cross browser compatibility issues.
*Creates and contributes to a rich library of robust, reusable components and tools to streamline future development
To Apply , send your CV to Jobs@drbridge.com with "Front End/UI Developer" in the subject.
By the author of the book with the same name. A revised edition of the book is coming November 2013
posts.caption: www.udacity.com
posts.description: Everyone designs. Design occurs anytime you deliberately change an environment to make things better. When you decide what seat to take in an auditorium you’re designing your experience. When you rearrange the furniture in a room or draft an email, you’re designing.
